alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, northeastern Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Marys, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Oceanway, Little Talbot Island, Nassau Village-Ratliff and Cumberland Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
